mapper.insert: insert into K_RESULT ( id , name , `group` , type , status , `read` , written , updated , input , output , deleted , retrieved , rejected , end_time , start_time , error , params , host , again , times , creator , created , modifier , modified ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{group}, #{type}, #{status}, #{read}, #{written}, #{updated}, #{input}, #{output}, #{deleted}, #{retrieved}, #{rejected}, #{endTime}, #{startTime}, #{error}, #{params}, #{host}, #{again}, #{times}, #{creator}, #{created}, #{modifier}, #{modified} )
mapper.update:
update K_RESULT
name = #{name},
`group` = #{group},
type = #{type},
status = #{status},
`read` = #{read},
written = #{written},
updated = #{updated},
input = #{input},
output = #{output},
deleted = #{deleted},
end_time = #{endTime},
start_time = #{startTime},
error = #{error},
params = #{params},
host = #{host},
retrieved = #{retrieved},
rejected = #{rejected},
again = #{again},
times = #{times},
creator = #{creator},
created = #{created},
modifier = #{modifier},
modified = #{modified}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT id , name , `group` , type , status , `read` , written , updated , input , output , deleted , retrieved , rejected , end_time endTime , start_time startTime , error , params , host , again , times , creator , created , modifier , modified FROM K_RESULT
id = #{id}
